document_data.name: Ivellin Farwanderer
document_data.mainbody: '''Ivellin Farwanderer''' was an [[elf]] [[ranger]] and [[arcane archer]] of [[Mielikki]] operating in [[Cormanthor]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite web/Realms Personalities/Vishara}}
document_data.Activities: Ivellin was the second-in-command of the warrior priestess [[Vishara]] in her campaign against [[Nashyim|Nashyim of the Desolated Wood]], a [[volodni]] [[blightlord]] of [[Talona]] and servant of the [[Rotting Man]] who had invaded the forests of Cormanthor.<ref>{{Cite web/Realms Personalities/Nashyim}} Ivellin was in charge of scouting missions, which kept track of the movements and plans of Nashyim and his [[blightspawned creature]]s.
